<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EId = Edges.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Edges.push&#95;back(std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a> = getEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the edge to the adjacency sets of its nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a>.connect(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Construct an empty PBQP graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a51b411ba1e7da55498b4eacd7185c5c1"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a51b411ba1e7da55498b4eacd7185c5c1">Graph</a>() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Construct an empty PBQP graph with the given graph metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac1b8aade7a27183542a1dc10a34d28ef"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac1b8aade7a27183542a1dc10a34d28ef">Graph</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a> Metadata) : Metadata(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(Metadata)) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get a reference to the graph metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aed0054f4566fed7f8dbb7090b58d5e38"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a>&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aed0054f4566fed7f8dbb7090b58d5e38">getMetadata</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Metadata; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Get a const-reference to the graph metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b5d794cba9a4308aad0f5970412b500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b4311ed4a57ef1150d10b23d683e439">GraphMetadata</a>&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a1b5d794cba9a4308aad0f5970412b500">getMetadata</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Metadata; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Lock this graph to the given solver instance in preparation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// for running the solver. This method will call solver.handleAddNode for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// each node in the graph, and handleAddEdge for each edge, to give the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// solver an opportunity to set up any requried metadata.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a89f92ffd256a37d37726145b00d09b77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a89f92ffd256a37d37726145b00d09b77">setSolver</a>(SolverT &amp;S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Solver &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Solver already set. Call unsetSolver().&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Solver = &amp;S;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a84ff7ee5d27c3a8173490fb89d7a7379">nodeIds</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleAddNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#afb740fccb3ee61c6176f946bb22e9b1a">edgeIds</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleAddEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Release from solver instance.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0277999b64eeab12e9dcb9bc6d965b4c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0277999b64eeab12e9dcb9bc6d965b4c">unsetSolver</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Solver &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Solver not set.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Solver = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Add a node with the given costs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// @param Costs Cost vector for the new node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// @return Node iterator for the added node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherVectorT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae7ac2dc045a204de18d1b15863dd037b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae7ac2dc045a204de18d1b15863dd037b">addNode</a>(OtherVectorT Costs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get cost vector from the problem domain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#af286e5a878c03492516f4e8431e891a0">VectorPtr</a> AllocatedCosts = CostAlloc.getVector(std::move(Costs));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId = addConstructedNode(NodeEntry(AllocatedCosts));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Solver)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleAddNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NId;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Add a node bypassing the cost allocator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// @param Costs Cost vector ptr for the new node (must be convertible to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///        VectorPtr).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// @return Node iterator for the added node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///   This method allows for fast addition of a node whose costs don&#39;t need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to be passed through the cost allocator. The most common use case for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// this is when duplicating costs from an existing node (when using a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// pooling allocator). These have already been uniqued, so we can avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// re-constructing and re-uniquing them by attaching them directly to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// new node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OtherVectorPtrT&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Solver)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Remove a node from the graph.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleRemoveNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NodeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = getNode(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Can this be for-each&#39;d?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#abc9cbae0487a2766aa1b4c9050c906b8">AdjEdgeItr</a> AEItr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.adjEdgesBegin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">             AEEnd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.adjEdgesEnd();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">           AEItr != AEEnd;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId = &#42;AEItr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++AEItr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae588c35f459a7e4925b870ece5849a8b">removeEdge</a>(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FreeNodeIds.push&#95;back(NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Disconnect an edge from the given node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Removes the given edge from the adjacency list of the given node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This operation leaves the edge in an &#39;asymmetric&#39; state: It will no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// longer appear in an iteration over the given node&#39;s (NId&#39;s) edges, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// will appear in an iteration over the &#39;other&#39;, unnamed node&#39;s edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This does not correspond to any normal graph operation, but exists to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// support efficient PBQP graph-reduction based solvers. It is used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// &#39;effectively&#39; remove the unnamed node from the graph while the solver</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// is performing the reduction. The solver will later call reconnectNode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to restore the edge in the named node&#39;s adjacency list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Since the degree of a node is the number of connected edges,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// disconnecting an edge from a node &#39;u&#39; will cause the degree of &#39;u&#39; to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// drop by 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A disconnected edge WILL still appear in an iteration over the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A disconnected edge should not be removed from the graph, it should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// reconnected first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A disconnected edge can be reconnected by calling the reconnectEdge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8">disconnectEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Solver)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleDisconnectEdge(EId, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.disconnectFrom(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Convenience method to disconnect all neighbours from the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///        node.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac3a81ba1d3a9b9fd110dd0f5114b5189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac3a81ba1d3a9b9fd110dd0f5114b5189">disconnectAllNeighborsFromNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AEId : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a4936340a88a6f1856e6edab7357d1270">adjEdgeIds</a>(NId))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a0fc861a44ceb8e7b9ad83ff1376990b8">disconnectEdge</a>(AEId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#a3fc350aed201496737e62751a8ad95f4">getEdgeOtherNodeId</a>(AEId, NId));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Re-attach an edge to its nodes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Adds an edge that had been previously disconnected back into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// adjacency set of the nodes that the edge connects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac7c7346dbc788cb3913012430e538011"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ac7c7346dbc788cb3913012430e538011">reconnectEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a7187d2e408994bd7307a4c8f32f745a8">NodeId</a> NId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.connectTo(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, EId, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Solver)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleReconnectEdge(EId, NId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Remove an edge from the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// @param EId Edge id.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae588c35f459a7e4925b870ece5849a8b"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#ae588c35f459a7e4925b870ece5849a8b">removeEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graphbase/#a679643c1e5202061ef3e9b121a2a7dce">EdgeId</a> EId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Solver)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Solver-&gt;handleRemoveEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EdgeEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = getEdge(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.disconnect();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FreeEdgeIds.push&#95;back(EId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edges&#91;EId&#93;.invalidate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Remove all nodes and edges from the graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aa23dfa6d17e0a66e9d2ceffc5e57812d"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pbqp/graph/#aa23dfa6d17e0a66e9d2ceffc5e57812d">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Nodes.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FreeNodeIds.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Edges.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FreeEdgeIds.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
